name.baseName: Soil remediation ; ex-situ remediation ; thermal desorption remediation ; engineering implementation ; ex-situ thermal desorption main treatment
土壤修复;异位修复;热脱附修复;工程实施;异位热脱附主处理

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Remediation of 1 cubic meter of contaminated soil by ectopic thermal desorption, the contaminated soil is transported to the rotary kiln through the feeder and the conveying device, and the contaminated soil is transported to the rotary kiln through the natural gas.
异位热脱附修复1立方米污染土，通过上料机和传送装置，将污染土壤输送到回转窑，通入天然气，将污染土壤均 匀加热到设定的温度，并按照设定速率向窑尾输送至出料仓，在回转窑中使土壤中的污染物充分 气化挥发

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: 我国华东区域5 个污染土壤异位热脱附修复工程案例

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Through the feeding machine and the transmission device, the contaminated soil is transported to the rotary kiln, and the natural gas is introduced to the contaminated soil.
通过上料机和传送装置，将污染土壤输送到回转窑，通入天然气，将污染土壤均匀加热到设定的温度，并按照设定速率向窑尾输送至出料仓，在回转窑中使土壤中的污染物充分气化挥发
technology.technologicalApplicability: The process described pertains to the ex situ thermal desorption remediation of 1 cubic meter of contaminated soil. Contaminated soil is conveyed to a rotary kiln via a feeding machine and conveyor system, where natural gas is introduced to uniformly heat the soil to a set temperature. The soil is then transported at a predetermined rate towards the tail of the kiln and into the discharge hopper. In the rotary kiln, the contaminants in the soil are volatilized and gasified. This process is implemented in five case studies of soil contamination remediation projects in the East China region. The data set is applicable for environmental engineering firms focusing on soil remediation as well as for researchers studying the efficacy of thermal desorption methods for soil decontamination.
所描述的过程涉及1立方米受污染土壤的异位热脱附修复。通过上料机和传送系统，将受污染土壤输送至回转窑中，在窑内引入天然气，将土壤均匀加热至设定温度。土壤随后按预定速率向窑尾移动至出料仓。在回转窑中，土壤中的污染物被挥发和气化。这个过程在中国华东地区5个污染土壤异位热脱附修复项目案例中得到了执行。数据集适用于专注于土壤修复的环境工程公司以及研究土壤脱附方法效能的研究人员。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 刘爽,陈盼,宋慧敏等.我国华东地区污染土壤异位热脱附修复碳排放及减排策略[J].环境工程学报,2022,16(08):2663-2671.
刘爽,陈盼,宋慧敏等.我国华东地区污染土壤异位热脱附修复碳排放及减排策略[J].环境工程学报,2022,16(08):2663-2671.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set, ensure that the environmental conditions of the use case closely align with those of the East China region case studies, given the regional specificity of the processes described. Users should account for variations in soil composition, contaminant types, and local regulations which may affect the applicability and effectiveness of the thermal desorption process. Additionally, consider the efficiency, energy requirements, and potential emissions associated with the use of natural gas in the heating process. Methodologically, this data should be used with considerations for the boundary conditions of the LCA, specifically whether the scope includes or excludes the consequences of the gasification and volatilization of contaminants.
使用此数据集时，请确保使用案例的环境条件与华东地区案例研究所描述的过程的地域特定性紧密相关。用户应考虑土壤组成、污染物类型和可能影响热脱附过程适用性和效果的当地法规的变化。此外，考虑使用天然气作为加热过程中的效率、能源需求和可能排放。在方法论上，应考虑到生命周期评估的边界条件，特别是范围是否包括了污染物气化和挥发的后果。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Soil treated with ex-situ thermal desorption primary treatment
